name: Die-Cast
description:
This is a five-minute-long story about an antique shop, mysterious curios, and an unexpected friendship.

(Better enjoyed with the sound on.)

Credits

  • Published by Brand New Whatever
  • Written by Jigu 
  • Banner & Thumbnail feature "It's A Gamble" by MarkyBon (licensed under CC BY-NC-SA 2.0)
  • Background art features "DSC00551 - Antique Shop" by archer10 (Dennis) (licensed under CC BY-SA 2.0)
  • Soundtrack by... play the game, find out, and avoid spoilers. :)
